name: TRY-GUN
description:
TRY-GUN is a game about platforming and shooting. Short and fun, should be a small experience with some action and challenges. If you played the game, please leave a comment detailing what you liked and didn't, any feedback appreciated!

The game is currently quite short - if there is a positive reception I can extend it with new mechanics and guns and levels.

Update: pistol and SMG now have spread, prevents pistol from being OP and makes the SMG feel more like an SMG. SMG ammo size has been increased to compensate.

If you want to follow my development progress make sure to hit follow @ali3ndev on twitter ;)
